mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_CLASS ( F_CLASS_ID, F_OWNER_PROJECT_ID, F_CLASS_NAME, F_ORDER_EXPR, F_TITLE_EXPR, F_TITLE, F_DESCRIPTION, F_NOTE, F__LAST_UPDATED_AT ) VALUES ( #{ classId }, #{ ownerProjectId }, #{ className }, #{ orderExpr }, #{ titleExpr }, #{ title }, #{ description }, #{ note }, (strftime('%s', 'now') * 1000) )
mapper.update: UPDATE T_CLASS SET F_OWNER_PROJECT_ID = #{ ownerProjectId }, F_CLASS_NAME = #{ className }, F_ORDER_EXPR = #{ orderExpr }, F_TITLE_EXPR = #{ titleExpr }, F_TITLE = #{ title }, F_DESCRIPTION = #{ description }, F_NOTE = #{ note }, F__LAST_UPDATED_AT = (strftime('%s', 'now') * 1000) WHERE F_CLASS_ID = #{ classId } AND F__LAST_UPDATED_AT = #{ _lastUpdatedAt }
mapper.select: SELECT T1.F_CLASS_ID AS "classId", T1.F_OWNER_PROJECT_ID AS "ownerProjectId", T1.F_CLASS_NAME AS "className", T1.F_ORDER_EXPR AS "orderExpr", T1.F_TITLE_EXPR AS "titleExpr", T1.F_TITLE AS "title", T1.F_DESCRIPTION AS "description", T1.F_NOTE AS "note", T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT AS "_lastUpdatedAt", T1.F_TITLE AS "_title", T2.F_TITLE AS "owner_title" FROM T_CLASS T1 LEFT JOIN T_PROJECT T2 ON T1.F_OWNER_PROJECT_ID = T2.F_PROJECT_ID WHERE T1.F_CLASS_ID = #{ classId }
SELECT MAX(T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT) AS "max_lastUpdatedAt", COUNT(*) AS "count", 0 AS "focus" FROM T_CLASS T1

SELECT MAX(T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT) AS "max_lastUpdatedAt", COUNT(*) AS "count", 0 AS "focus" FROM T_CLASS T1 WHERE
T1.F_CLASS_NAME = #{name}

SELECT T1.F_PROJECT_ID AS "projectId", T1.F_PROJECT_NAME AS "projectName", T1.F_GRADLE_NAME AS "gradleName", T1.F_TITLE AS "title", T1.F_DESCRIPTION AS "description", T1.F_NOTE AS "note", T1.F_COPYRIGHTS AS "copyrights", T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT AS "_lastUpdatedAt", T1.F_TITLE AS "_title" FROM T_PROJECT T1 WHERE T1.F_PROJECT_ID = #{ ownerProjectId }
